name: Check Secrets

on: 
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  check-secrets:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    timeout-minutes: 5
    environment: test
    env:
      USERNAME: ${{ vars.USERNAME }}
      PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.PASSWORD }}

    steps:
      - name: Print environment variables
        run: echo "${USERNAME} - ${PASSWORD}"
